select * from frequent_view f left outer join ( select count(store_no) as fqCount, store_no as st from frequent_view
group by st ) freCnt on f.store_no = st group by f.store_no order by fqCount desc;

select * from frequent_view f left outer join ( select count(user_no) fqCount, store_no as st from frequent_view where user_gender = 'M'
group by st ) male on f.store_no = st group by f.store_no order by fqCount desc;

select * from frequent_view f left outer join ( select count(user_no) fqCount, store_no as st from frequent_view where user_gender = 'F'
group by st ) female on f.store_no = st group by f.store_no order by fqCount desc;
